participant_1.background:
I collect rare and unusual medical oddities to help me feel better about my own health.
I usually start my day with a workout to get my body moving and my mind sharp.
my family gets together every saturday.
i am always looking for wildlife when i am outside.
I earn money from my farm and YouTube channel.

participant_2.background:
I cherish my favorite pair of running shoes.
i am very skinny and energetic.
i like lightning mcqueen.
I spend most of my time working, but I make time for my friends and family when I can.
i work at a non profit that helps children.

content.text: What are you up to today?
I'm working on a project for my non-profit. How about you?
I'm just enjoying a relaxing morning. I always start my day with a workout to get my body moving and my mind sharp. What do you do to get your day going?
I like to get up early and go for a run. I love being outside and I find it's a great way to start the day.
That's great! I don't run as much as I used to, but I do enjoy it when I do. I love the feeling of being out in nature and being active.
Me too! It's also a great way to clear your head and de-stress.
I know what you mean. What do you do for fun?
I like to spend time with my friends and family. I also love to read and watch movies.
I love to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Harry Potter series and the Outlander series.
I've heard good things about Outlander! I've never read it, but I've seen the show.
The show is great! But the books are even better.
I'll have to check them out.
